planets.lore_description:
Tatooine is a forest world with a mild climate, home to a massive (trillions) population 
governed by a theocracy. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's forest environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

final_boss.name: Admiral Kethan
final_boss.title: Destroyer
final_boss.motivation: aims to unlock forbidden Sith knowledge
final_boss.backstory:
Admiral Kethan, known as Destroyer, is a Chiss who aims to unlock forbidden Sith knowledge. 

Born during the old republic era, Admiral Kethan was once a promising individual who 
showed great potential in the Force. However, their path took a dark turn when they 
discovered ancient secrets that changed their perspective on the galaxy.

Their current plan involves aims to unlock forbidden sith knowledge, which directly threatens the stability 
of the galaxy. The events described in "i want a 12-hour adventure about finding ancient jedi artifacts" are merely the beginning 
of their grand design.

Admiral Kethan has spent years gathering followers and resources, preparing for this moment when 
they can finally implement their vision for the galaxy's future. They see themselves 
not as a villain, but as a necessary force for change in a corrupt and stagnant galaxy.
mechanics: Boss gains new abilities and changes tactics at 75%, 50%, and 25% health
Boss summons waves of minions throughout the fight
Boss demonstrates mastery of multiple weapon types during combat

phases.tactics: Uses most powerful abilities and becomes more unpredictable

phases.name: Final Stand
phases.tactics: Unleashes full power in a last desperate attempt

final_boss.arena_description: Ancient Jedi ruins with crumbling architecture and Force echoes Located on Hoth, this jedi_ruins reflects the planet's desert environment. Broken lightsaber crystals litter the ground, still glowing faintly with residual energy.

loot_drop.name: Admiral Kethan's Legacy
loot_drop.flavor_text: The final remnant of Destroyer Admiral Kethan's power. This legendary weapon pulses with the Force energy of its former owner, granting incredible abilities to those worthy enough to wield it.

campaign_summary:
Campaign: I Want A 12-Hour Adventure About Finding Ancient Jedi Artifacts
Duration: 12 hours
Era: Old Republic
Alignment: Light Side focus

Your journey will take you across 4 worlds including Tatooine, Coruscant, Naboo, and 1 other worlds.
The ultimate confrontation awaits with Admiral Kethan, aims to unlock forbidden Sith knowledge.

This campaign emphasizes light side choices and is set during the old republic era.
